"How many people are affected by hypermanganesemia with dystonia, polycythemia, and cirrhosis ?",The prevalence of HMDPC is unknown. A small number of cases have been described in the scientific literature.,GHR,"hypermanganesemia with dystonia, polycythemia, and cirrhosis"
